evidence_example.title: Serial demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This example shows how to use the serial line RS232 both in polling and interrupt mode.
evidence_example.long_descr: This example can be used to test the serial communication on RS232 ports. In polling mode it uses 2 functions to send and receive bytes. In interrupt modes the send function put data in a queue and the uses is acknowledged through a callback function. Another callback is in charge of incoming data. The demo supports both UART1 and UART2, and it works on the FLEX Multibus, Demo, and Motion board.
